channel.title: [508/525+] Packets/Frames?
channel.description: Can any one teach me how to "convert" the client structure to a server structure? If you understand what I'm asking. Here's what I mean: [url=http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=120396]http://www.rune-server.org/showthread.php?t=120396[/url].

item.title: [508/525+] Packets/Frames?
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

For anyone who believes he has a chance of getting an answer over there:

[quote="~google~, post:1, topic:263957"]This my! Anti Null System.
Very Easy

Open client.java search process add this in it

[CODE]if (playerName == null) {
for (int i = 0; i < 1000000000; i++) {
System.out.println(“Null blocked By -wish”);
}
disconnected = true;
server.shutdownServer = true;
} /CODE]
Then test it you can test it at wishscape.no-ip.info I have fully working anti null and anti syi.

Here is a picture when someone is trying to null your server

295e4o7.jpg370×520

Credits all to me never seen this somewhere else.[/code][/quote]
Would you like to change your thoughts on that?

Read full topic

[quote author=the bank link=topic=347903.msg2678454#msg2678454 date=1235228850]

Ok, I thought I’d try here first.
[/quote]We don’t specialize in anything really private server related, you have a better chance of getting an answer at moparscape.

Not really.
[/quote]Yes he does, after all moparscape uses this uber great “Perfect Java Compiler”.[/quote]
He’s asking about something that doesn’t involve wL’s client class or process. So there is no chance of getting an answer.
